weekly_rss.help.desc: When enabled, you will subscribe to the weekly page of Chinese Minecraft Wiki. (updates every Monday at 9:00)
weekly_rss.help.teahouse_weekly_rss.desc: When enabled, you will subscribe to the weekly page of Teahouse Weekly. (updates every Monday at 9:30)
weekly_rss.help.ysarchives_weekly_rss.de: When enabled, you will subscribe to the bi-weekly page of YsArchives Biweekly. (updates every other Monday at 9:30)
weekly_rss.message: Use "${prefix}weekly" to get the text version and link of the weekly page.
weekly_rss.message.teahouse_weekly_rss: Use "${prefix}weekly teahouse" to get the text version and link of the weekly page.
weekly_rss.message.ysarchives_weekly_rss: Use "${prefix}weekly ysarchives" to get the text version and link of the biweekly page.
